#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
bool _check(long num1)
{
long num=num1,reverse=0;
int digit=0;
while(num!=0)
{
digit=num%10;
reverse=reverse*10+digit;
num=num/10;
}
if(num1==reverse)
return true;
else
return false;
}
 
int main()
{
int t;
long number;
cin>>t;
while(t>0)
{
cin>>number;
number=number-1;
while(true)
{
++number;
if(_check(number))
{break;}
}
cout<<number<<"\n";
t--;
}
 
return 0;
}
